北漁船で仲間１６人殺害、「豚を殺すようにやればいい」

07 Nov 2019, 10:25

　【ソウル＝岡部雄二郎】韓国統一省は７日、日本海を漂流中に拿捕（だほ）した北朝鮮のイカ釣り漁船に乗っていた２０歳代の男２人が、漁師仲間１６人を相次いで船上で殺害した疑いが強まったとして、北朝鮮側に強制送還したと発表した。過酷な仕事を強いる船長に不満を募らせ、本人を殺害した後、口封じのために他の船員も襲撃し、遺体を海に遺棄したという。
　統一省の発表や国家情報院の国会報告によると、男２人が乗った船は１１月２日、海上の軍事境界線にあたる北方限界線（ＮＬＬ）の韓国側で韓国海軍に拿捕された。韓国政府の調査に対し、１６人の殺害を自供した上で亡命を求めたが、凶悪犯を受け入れれば国民生活に影響が生じるとして韓国側は拒否し、軍事境界線上の板門店（パンムンジョム）を通じて７日に北朝鮮側に身柄を引き渡した。
　韓国政府関係者は記者団に対し、「今回のような（北朝鮮の）凶悪犯罪者を追放するのは初めてだ」と語った。
　男２人は１０月末頃、別の船員１人に「船長を殺そう。豚を殺すようにやればいい」などと持ちかけ、犯行に及んだ疑いが持たれている。３人は共謀して船長を殺害した上で、当直の交代を装って約４０分に１度の間隔でほかの船員たちを甲板に呼び出し、斧（おの）やハンマーで順番に襲撃したという。一晩で犯行を終えた後、北朝鮮に戻り、漁で取れたイカを売ろうとしたところ、１人が北朝鮮当局につかまったため、残り２人が船で韓国側に逃れてきたという。
　韓国政府関係者は、供述以外の物証があるのかどうかは明らかにしなかったが、「情報機関も加わり、疑いの余地がないほど調査した」と述べた。
　北朝鮮は最近、経済制裁に対抗する外貨稼ぎの一環として漁業に力を入れている。１０月７日には北朝鮮の漁船が日本の水産庁の漁業取締船と日本海上で衝突し、沈没するなど、漁業を巡るトラブルが起こっている。

16 people killed on the north fishing boat, "You should do as if you kill pigs"

07 Nov 2019, 10:25

[Seoul = Yujiro Okabe] South Korea ’s Ministry of Unification on the 7th, two men in their twenties who were on a North Korean squid fishing fishing boat captured while drifting in the Sea of Japan gathered 16 fishermen. He announced that he was forcibly repatriated to the North Korean side for allegedly murdering on board. After frustrating the captain who demanded harsh work and killing himself, other sailors attacked it to close the mouth, and the body was abandoned in the sea.
According to the announcement of the Ministry of Unity and the National Intelligence Service's National Diet Report, the ship on which the two men got on was captured by the Korean Navy on November 2 on the Korean side of the Northern Limit Line (NLL), which is the maritime military boundary. In response to a South Korean government's investigation, he requested asylum after killing 16 people, but the Korean side refused that accepting a violent crime would affect the lives of the people, and through the Panmunjom branch on the military boundary. On July 7, he was handed over to North Korea.
“The Korean government official told reporters that it was the first time to expel such a violent offender (North Korea).”
[2] Around the end of October, two men asked another sailor, "Let's kill the captain. I should do it to kill the pig." The three men conspired to kill the captain, and in the guise of a shift of duty, called the other sailors on the deck at intervals of about once every 40 minutes and attacked in turn with an ax or hammer. . After finishing the crime overnight, he returned to North Korea and tried to sell the squid caught by fishing. One person was caught by the North Korean authorities, and the other two people escaped to the Korean side by boat.
The Korean government officials did not reveal whether there was any evidence other than the statement, but said, “The information agency was also added, and there was no doubt.”
North Korea has recently been focusing on fishing as part of its foreign currency earning against economic sanctions. On October 7th, there were troubles related to the fishing industry, such as the North Korean fishing boat collided with the Japanese Fisheries Agency's fisheries management vessel on the Japan Sea and sank.
